com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.gif

Class GifOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.gif.GifOptions

  • public final class GifOptions
extends Object
    Options related to decoding GIFs.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Option<DecodeFormat> DECODE_FORMAT
      Indicates the DecodeFormat that will be used in conjunction with the particular GIF to determine the Bitmap.Config to use when decoding frames of GIFs.
      static Option<Boolean> DISABLE_ANIMATION
      If set to true, disables the GIF ResourceDecoders (ResourceDecoder.handles(Object, Options) will return false).

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • DECODE_FORMAT

        public static final Option<DecodeFormat> DECODE_FORMAT
        Indicates the DecodeFormat that will be used in conjunction with the particular GIF to determine the Bitmap.Config to use when decoding frames of GIFs.

      • DISABLE_ANIMATION

        public static final Option<Boolean> DISABLE_ANIMATION
        If set to true, disables the GIF ResourceDecoders (ResourceDecoder.handles(Object, Options) will return false). Defaults to false.
